value:
$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|I often wonder what would happen if
I were to die. Do you think about that,
dear?$k$pDoes it scare you...pondering what
happens after death?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|Yes... It does.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hee-hee. I see. No matter where you
find yourself, that fear slumbers in
the depths of your heart...$k$pDie and your consciousness will
fade into nothing.$k$pYour sight...your hearing...your
thoughts... They will all simply fade
away. Just darkness...for eternity.$k$pAnd what of the world you leave
behind? There's no way to know
what will happen.$k$pYou can't help but feel afraid.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|Yes...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|But what if you could return?$k$pWhat if the same body, with the
same memories you have now,
could be born time and again?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|That's not possible! The dead don't
return to life.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Perhaps. Hee-hee.$k$pBut I am not talking about a corpse
springing up full of renewed life...$k$pI am talking about an existence that
returns to life again and again, born
anew...infinitely.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Where...are we?$k$pAre you OK, $Nu?$k$pWhere is Sharena...and everyone
else?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|*yawn* I'm awake...$k$p$EFace_Cool2|What? Where am I?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We seem to be in another world. It
isn't any place I've seen before,
however.$k$pHow did we suddenly come to find
ourselves here?$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|None of you are from this world
either, are you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I know you...$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|I am Azura. It seems that, like all of
you, I awoke to find myself in this
world.$k$pUnlike you, however...I recognize it.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|You do? Can you explain?$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|The enemy is already here. We aren't
safe. I'll tell you everything I know
after we defeat them.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|I...remember this world. It was a long
time ago. I saw it in a dream...$k$pI was a child, so I don't remember it
very well. I am sure, however, that
this is the same world I dreamt.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That you dreamt? Meaning...what?$k$pThat we're in your dream right now?$k$p$EFace_Pain|Ouch! Well, it hurts when I pinch
myself.$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Even so...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If it is as you say and it's a dream,
whose is it?$k$pIs it your dream, Azura, that we have
been pulled into?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I find it strange. I am completely
aware of myself. If I'm in someone
else's dream, how can that be?$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|I don't understand it either.$k$pI do have some dragon's blood in
my veins.$k$pAnd that dragon had the power to
glimpse the strands of futures yet
to come...$k$pMaybe that has something to do
with it.$k$p$Sbs150|
